TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SamlAccessDecision extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether the subject of a security token is granted access to a given resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the SamlAccessDecision to express access permissions to a resource in a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> within a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision Deny = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that access to a resource is denied.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision Indeterminate = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the security token service that issued the security token does not have enough information to determine the access permissions for a particular resource. A recipient of the security token must use other means to determine the user's access permissions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision Permit = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that access to a resource is granted.
